TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit KeyedCollection`2<TKey, TItem> extends System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<!TItem>
Public MustInherit Class KeyedCollection(Of TKey, TItem) Inherits Collection(Of TItem)
generic <typename TKey, typename TItem> public ref class KeyedCollection abstract : System::Collections::ObjectModel::Collection<TItem>

span.span: The type of keys in the collection.
The type of items in the collection.

summary.span: 提供键嵌入在值中的集合的抽象基类。

span.span: Provides the abstract base class for a collection whose keys are embedded in the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供两个 o （1） 的索引检索和键控接近 o （1） 的检索。The class provides both O(1) indexed retrieval and keyed retrieval that approaches O(1). 它是抽象类型，或更准确地无限设置的抽象类型，因为每个构造的泛型类型是一个抽象基类。It is an abstract type, or more accurately an infinite set of abstract types, because each of its constructed generic types is an abstract base class. 若要使用，派生自的适当的构造类型的集合类型。To use , derive your collection type from the appropriate constructed type. 类是基于集合的结合泛型接口和集合基于泛型接口。The class is a hybrid between a collection based on the generic interface and a collection based on the generic interface. 集合基于一样泛型接口，是项的索引的列表。Like collections based on the generic interface, is an indexed list of items. 集合基于一样泛型接口，具有与每个元素相关联的密钥。Like collections based on the generic interface, has a key associated with each element. 与字典的元素不同不是键/值对; 相反，整个元素为值和密钥嵌入的值中。Unlike dictionaries, an element of is not a key/value pair; instead, the entire element is the value and the key is embedded within the value. 例如，集合的元素派生自`KeyedCollection\`(`KeyedCollection(Of String, String)`在 Visual Basic 中) 可能是"John Doe Jr。"For example, an element of a collection derived from `KeyedCollection\` (`KeyedCollection(Of String, String)` in Visual Basic) might be "John Doe Jr." 其中的值是"John Doe Jr。"where the value is "John Doe Jr." 键为"Doe";无法从派生的员工记录包含整数键的集合或`KeyedCollection\`。and the key is "Doe"; or a collection of employee records containing integer keys could be derived from `KeyedCollection\`. 抽象方法从元素提取的键。The abstract method extracts the key from the element. 默认情况下，包括你可以获取与查找字典属性。By default, the includes a lookup dictionary that you can obtain with the property. 当将项添加到，一次提取并保存在更快的搜索查找字典项的键。When an item is added to the , the item's key is extracted once and saved in the lookup dictionary for faster searches. 通过在创建时指定字典创建阈值重写此行为。This behavior is overridden by specifying a dictionary creation threshold when you create the . 创建查找字典的元素数超过该阈值的第一个时间。The lookup dictionary is created the first time the number of elements exceeds that threshold. 如果您指定为-1 作为阈值，永远不会创建查找字典。If you specify –1 as the threshold, the lookup dictionary is never created. > [!NOTE] > 当使用内部查找字典时，它包含到集合中的所有项的引用，如果`TItem`是引用类型，或如果在集合中的所有项将复制`TItem`是值类型。When the internal lookup dictionary is used, it contains references to all the items in the collection if `TItem` is a reference type, or copies of all the items in the collection if `TItem` is a value type. 因此，使用查找字典可能不合适如果`TItem`是值类型。Thus, using the lookup dictionary may not be appropriate if `TItem` is a value type. 你可以通过访问其索引或键项属性。You can access an item by its index or key by using the property. 你可以将项目添加没有键，但随后可以仅通过索引访问这些项。You can add items without a key, but these items can subsequently be accessed only by index. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个示例演示派生自所需的最小代码，并演示了许多继承的方法。The first example shows the minimum code required to derive from , and demonstrates many of the inherited methods. 第二个示例演示如何重写的受保护的方法以提供自定义行为。The second example shows how to override the protected methods of to provide custom behavior. **示例 1****Example 1** 此代码示例演示的最少代码需要派生集合类从： 重写方法并提供的公共构造函数的委托给基类构造函数。This code example shows the minimum code necessary to derive a collection class from : overriding the method and providing a public constructor that delegates to a base class constructor. 下面的代码示例还演示了许多属性和方法继承和类。The code example also demonstrates many of the properties and methods inherited from and classes. `SimpleOrder`类是包含一个非常简单的请求列表`OrderItem`对象，其中每个表示顺序中的行项。The `SimpleOrder` class is a very simple requisition list that contains `OrderItem` objects, each of which represents a line item in the order. 键`OrderItem`不可变，派生自的类的重要考虑事项。The key of `OrderItem` is immutable, an important consideration for classes that derive from . 有关使用可变密钥的代码示例，请参阅。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . [!code-cpp[KeyedCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyedCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection/VB/source.vb#1)] **示例 2****Example 2** 下面的代码示例演示如何重写受保护， ， ，和方法，以提供自定义行为， ，和方法，以及设置默认属性 （C# 中的索引器）。The following code example shows how to override the protected , , , and methods, to provide custom behavior for the , , and methods, and for setting the default property (the indexer in C#). 在此示例中提供的自定义行为是名为的通知事件`Changed`，这在每个重写方法结束时引发。The custom behavior provided in this example is a notification event named `Changed`, which is raised at the end of each of the overridden methods. 此代码示例创建`SimpleOrder`类，该类派生自和表示简单订购窗体。The code example creates the `SimpleOrder` class, which derives from and represents a simple order form. 订购窗体包含`OrderItem`对象表示的项排序。The order form contains `OrderItem` objects representing items ordered. 此代码示例还创建`SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs`类，以包含事件信息和使用枚举标识的更改的类型。The code example also creates a `SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs` class to contain the event information, and an enumeration to identify the type of change. 该代码示例演示自定义行为通过调用的属性和方法的派生类中，在`Main`方法`Demo`类。The code example demonstrates the custom behavior by calling the properties and methods of the derived class, in the `Main` method of the `Demo` class. 此代码示例使用具有不可变的键的对象。This code example uses objects with immutable keys. 有关使用可变密钥的代码示例，请参阅。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . [!code-cpp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks A创建与此构造函数使用默认泛型相等比较器的一种密钥，来获取从。A created with this constructor uses the default generic equality comparer for the type of the key, obtained from . 若要指定不同的泛型相等比较器，使用构造函数或构造函数。To specify a different generic equality comparer, use the constructor or the constructor. 默认情况下，包括添加的第一项时创建查找字典。By default, the includes a lookup dictionary that is created when the first item is added. 当将项添加到，一次提取并保存在更快的搜索查找字典项的键。When an item is added to the , the item's key is extracted once and saved in the lookup dictionary for faster searches. 可以通过重写此行为构造函数并指定字典创建阈值。This behavior can be overridden by using the constructor and specifying a dictionary creation threshold. > [!NOTE] > 因为类为抽象类 (`MustInherit`在 Visual Basic 中)，你必须从它派生才能使用它。Because the class is abstract (`MustInherit` in Visual Basic), you must derive from it in order to use it. 在派生类型的构造函数，调用相应构造函数。In the constructor for your derived type, call the appropriate constructor. 不需要公开功能，例如的相等比较器或在你的构造函数中的字典创建阈值。It is not necessary to expose functionality like the equality comparer or the dictionary creation threshold in your constructors. 此构造函数是 o （1） 操作。This constructor is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 此代码示例演示的最少代码需要派生集合类从： 重写方法并提供的公共构造函数的委托给基类构造函数。This code example shows the minimum code necessary to derive a collection class from : overriding the method and providing a public constructor that delegates to a base class constructor. 下面的代码示例还演示了许多属性和方法继承和类。The code example also demonstrates many of the properties and methods inherited from and classes. `SimpleOrder`类是包含一个非常简单的请求列表`OrderItem`对象，其中每个表示顺序中的行项。The `SimpleOrder` class is a very simple requisition list that contains `OrderItem` objects, each of which represents a line item in the order. 键`OrderItem`不可变，派生自的类的重要考虑事项。The key of `OrderItem` is immutable, an important consideration for classes that derive from . 有关使用可变密钥的代码示例，请参阅。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，包括添加的第一项时创建查找字典。By default, the includes a lookup dictionary that is created when the first item is added. 当将项添加到，一次提取并保存在更快的搜索查找字典项的键。When an item is added to the , the item's key is extracted once and saved in the lookup dictionary for faster searches. 可以通过重写此行为构造函数并指定字典创建阈值。This behavior can be overridden by using the constructor and specifying a dictionary creation threshold. > [!NOTE] > 因为类为抽象类 (`MustInherit`在 Visual Basic 中)，你必须从它派生才能使用它。Because the class is abstract (`MustInherit` in Visual Basic), you must derive from it in order to use it. 在派生类型的构造函数，调用相应构造函数。In the constructor for your derived type, call the appropriate constructor. 不需要公开功能，例如的相等比较器或在你的构造函数中的字典创建阈值。It is not necessary to expose functionality like the equality comparer or the dictionary creation threshold in your constructors. 此构造函数是 o （1） 操作。This constructor is an O(1) operation.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 比较键时要使用的 泛型接口的实现，如果为 ，则使用从 获取的该类型的键的默认相等比较器。

span.span: The implementation of the generic interface to use when comparing keys, or to use the default equality comparer for the type of the key, obtained from .

param.name: dictionaryCreationThreshold
param.span: 在不创建查找字典的情况下集合可容纳的元素的数目（0 表示添加第一项时创建查找字典）；或者为 -1，表示指定永远不会创建查找字典。

span.span: The number of elements the collection can hold without creating a lookup dictionary (0 creates the lookup dictionary when the first item is added), or –1 to specify that a lookup dictionary is never created.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，该新实例使用指定的相等比较器并在超过指定阈值时创建一个查找字典。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that uses the specified equality comparer and creates a lookup dictionary when the specified threshold is exceeded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，包括添加的第一项时创建查找字典。By default, the includes a lookup dictionary that is created when the first item is added. 当将项添加到，一次提取并保存在更快的搜索查找字典项的键。When an item is added to the , the item's key is extracted once and saved in the lookup dictionary for faster searches. 此构造函数，可重写该行为。This constructor allows you to override that behavior. 指定 0，则创建时添加的第一个元素的字典、 1 以便添加第二个元素，创建字典等。Specify 0 to create the dictionary when the first element is added, 1 to create the dictionary when the second element is added, and so on. 如果您指定为-1 作为阈值，永远不会创建查找字典。If you specify –1 as the threshold, the lookup dictionary is never created. 对于非常小的集合中提供的查找字典检索速度的改进不可能与字典所需的额外内存值得。For very small collections the improvement in retrieval speed provided by the lookup dictionary might not be worth the extra memory required by the dictionary. 设置阈值让你能够决定何时进行该权衡。Setting a threshold allows you to decide when to make that tradeoff. > [!NOTE] > 因为类为抽象类 (`MustInherit`在 Visual Basic 中)，你必须从它派生才能使用它。Because the class is abstract (`MustInherit` in Visual Basic), you must derive from it in order to use it. 在派生类型的构造函数，调用相应构造函数。In the constructor for your derived type, call the appropriate constructor. 不需要公开功能，例如的相等比较器或在你的构造函数中的字典创建阈值。It is not necessary to expose functionality like the equality comparer or the dictionary creation threshold in your constructors. 此构造函数是 o （1） 操作。This constructor is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写受保护， ， ，和方法，以提供自定义行为， ，和方法，以及设置默认属性 （C# 中的索引器）。The following code example shows how to override the protected , , , and methods, to provide custom behavior for the , , and methods, and for setting the default property (the indexer in C#). 在此示例中提供的自定义行为是名为的通知事件`Changed`，这在每个重写方法结束时引发。The custom behavior provided in this example is a notification event named `Changed`, which is raised at the end of each of the overridden methods. 此代码示例使用阈值为 0，构造函数，以便内部字典创建第一次一个的对象添加到集合。The code example uses the constructor with a threshold of 0, so that the internal dictionary is created the first time an object is added to the collection. 此代码示例创建`SimpleOrder`类，该类派生自和表示简单订购窗体。The code example creates the `SimpleOrder` class, which derives from and represents a simple order form. 订购窗体包含`OrderItem`对象表示的项排序。The order form contains `OrderItem` objects representing items ordered. 此代码示例还创建`SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs`类，以包含事件信息和使用枚举标识的更改的类型。The code example also creates a `SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs` class to contain the event information, and an enumeration to identify the type of change. 该代码示例演示自定义行为通过调用的属性和方法的派生类中，在`Main`方法`Demo`类。The code example demonstrates the custom behavior by calling the properties and methods of the derived class, in the `Main` method of the `Demo` class. 此代码示例使用具有不可变的键的对象。This code example uses objects with immutable keys. 有关使用可变密钥的代码示例，请参阅。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . [!code-cpp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/vb/source.vb#1)]

protected: void ChangeItemKey(TItem item, TKey newKey);

span.span: The element to change the key of.
The new key for item.

summary.span: 更改与查找字典中指定元素相关联的键。

span.span: Changes the key associated with the specified element in the lookup dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不会修改中嵌入的密钥`item`; 它只需将替换为保存在查找字典的键。This method does not modify the key embedded in `item`; it simply replaces the key saved in the lookup dictionary. 因此，如果`newKey`中嵌入的密钥不同`item`，不能访问`item`使用返回的键。Therefore, if `newKey` is different from the key that is embedded in `item`, you cannot access `item` by using the key returned by . 此方法不执行任何操作如果没有查找字典。This method does nothing if the does not have a lookup dictionary. 中的所有键必须是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique. 密钥不能为`null`。A key cannot be `null`. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## 实施者注意事项Notes for Implementers 修改键嵌入在项中之前，必须调用此方法来更新中查找字典的键。Before modifying the key embedded in an item, you must call this method to update the key in the lookup dictionary. 如果字典创建阈值为 – 1，则不需要调用此方法。If the dictionary creation threshold is –1, calling this method is not necessary. 不会公开作为派生类的公共方法的方法。Do not expose the method as a public method of a derived class. 此方法使用不当将同步的与项的键查找字典。Misuse of this method puts the lookup dictionary out of sync with item keys. 例如，将密钥设置为`null`和又将其设置为其他值将一个项的多个键添加到查找字典。For example, setting the key to `null` and then setting it to another value adds multiple keys for an item to the lookup dictionary. 公开此方法在内部以允许可变项密钥： 当项的键更改时，此方法用于更改中查找字典的键。Expose this method internally to allow mutable item keys: When the key for an item changes, this method is used to change the key in the lookup dictionary. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写受保护方法，以支持可变键，以及如何重写受保护， ， ，和方法以维护的键的完整性和集合中。The following code example shows how to override the protected method to support mutable keys, and how to override the protected , , , and methods to maintain the integrity of the keys and the collection. 此代码示例创建`MutableKeys`集合，派生自，和`MutableKey`类。The code example creates the `MutableKeys` collection, which derives from , and the `MutableKey` class. `MutableKey`类具有一个可设置`Key`属性。The `MutableKey` class has a settable `Key` property. 如果新的密钥分配给该属性，属性 setter 调用`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中)`ChangeKey`的集合以测试是否新密钥会与现有密钥冲突的方法。When a new key is assigned to the property, the property setter calls the `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `ChangeKey` method of the collection to test whether the new key would conflict with an existing key. 如果是这样，将引发异常，且未更改的属性值。If so, an exception is thrown and the property value is not changed. 为了维护之间的连接`MutableKey`对象和`MutableKeys`集合并防止对象插入到两个集合：`MutableKey`类具有`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中) `Collection`字段。In order to maintain the connection between a `MutableKey` object and the `MutableKeys` collection and to prevent an object from being inserted into two collections, the `MutableKey` class has an `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `Collection` field. 此字段由受保护的方法，它提供用于添加和从集合中，如移除项的自定义行为维护方法。This field is maintained by the protected methods that provide custom behavior for adding and removing items from the collection, such as the method. 该字段时添加到集合的项并且将其清除时移除的项设置。The field is set when the item is added to a collection and cleared when the item is removed. [!code-csharp[KeyedCollectionMutable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollectionMutable/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollectionMutable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollectionMutable/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 从 中移除所有元素。

span.span: Removes all elements from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有查找字典，此方法将清除它，但不删除它。If there is a lookup dictionary, this method clears it but does not delete it. 如果元素的数目超出了字典创建阈值和是使用查找字典，它将继续使用查找字典，即使元素的数目再次低于阈值。If the number of elements has exceeded the dictionary creation threshold and the is using a lookup dictionary, it will continue to use a lookup dictionary even though the number of elements is again under the threshold. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## 实施者注意事项Notes for Implementers 重写此方法以提供自定义的行为方法，继承自泛型类。Override this method to provide customized behavior for the method, inherited from the generic class. 调用此方法来清除基础集合并清除查找字典的基类实现。Call the base class implementation of this method to clear the underlying collection and to clear the lookup dictionary. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例演示如何重写方法以用于清除集合中的所有对象提供自定义行为。This section contains two code examples that demonstrate overriding the method to provide custom behavior for clearing all objects from the collection. 第一个示例中添加自定义通知事件并第二个具有可变键为的对象的集合提供支持。The first example adds a custom notification event and the second provides support for a collection of objects with mutable keys. 示例 1Example 1 下面的代码示例演示如何重写受保护， ， ，和方法，以提供自定义行为， ，和方法，以及设置默认属性 （C# 中的索引器）。The following code example shows how to override the protected , , , and methods, to provide custom behavior for the , , and methods, and for setting the default property (the indexer in C#). 在此示例中提供的自定义行为是名为的通知事件`Changed`，这在每个重写方法结束时引发。The custom behavior provided in this example is a notification event named `Changed`, which is raised at the end of each of the overridden methods. 此代码示例创建`SimpleOrder`类，该类派生自和表示简单订购窗体。The code example creates the `SimpleOrder` class, which derives from and represents a simple order form. 订购窗体包含`OrderItem`对象表示的项排序。The order form contains `OrderItem` objects representing items ordered. 此代码示例还创建`SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs`类，以包含事件信息和使用枚举标识的更改的类型。The code example also creates a `SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs` class to contain the event information, and an enumeration to identify the type of change. 该代码示例演示自定义行为通过调用的属性和方法的派生类中，在`Main`方法`Demo`类。The code example demonstrates the custom behavior by calling the properties and methods of the derived class, in the `Main` method of the `Demo` class. 此代码示例使用具有不可变的键的对象。This code example uses objects with immutable keys. 有关使用可变密钥的代码示例，请参阅。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . [!code-cpp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/vb/source.vb#1)] 示例 2Example 2 下面的代码示例演示如何重写受保护方法，以支持可变键，以及如何重写受保护， ， ，和方法以维护的键的完整性和集合中。The following code example shows how to override the protected method to support mutable keys, and how to override the protected , , , and methods to maintain the integrity of the keys and the collection. 此代码示例创建`MutableKeys`集合，派生自，和`MutableKey`类。The code example creates the `MutableKeys` collection, which derives from , and the `MutableKey` class. `MutableKey`类具有一个可设置`Key`属性。The `MutableKey` class has a settable `Key` property. 如果新的密钥分配给该属性，属性 setter 调用`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中)`ChangeKey`的集合以测试是否新密钥会与现有密钥冲突的方法。When a new key is assigned to the property, the property setter calls the `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `ChangeKey` method of the collection to test whether the new key would conflict with an existing key. 如果是这样，将引发异常，且未更改的属性值。If so, an exception is thrown and the property value is not changed. 为了维护之间的连接`MutableKey`对象和`MutableKeys`集合并防止对象插入到两个集合：`MutableKey`类具有`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中) `Collection`字段。In order to maintain the connection between a `MutableKey` object and the `MutableKeys` collection and to prevent an object from being inserted into two collections, the `MutableKey` class has an `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `Collection` field. 此字段由受保护的方法，它提供用于添加和从集合中，如移除项的自定义行为维护方法。This field is maintained by the protected methods that provide custom behavior for adding and removing items from the collection, such as the method. 该字段时添加到集合的项并且将其清除时移除的项设置。The field is set when the item is added to a collection and cleared when the item is removed. [!code-csharp[KeyedCollectionMutable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollectionMutable/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollectionMutable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollectionMutable/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具有查找字典，`key`用于搜索的字典。If the has a lookup dictionary, `key` is used to search the dictionary. 如果没有任何查找字典，使用提取每个元素的键方法并与指定的键进行比较。If there is no lookup dictionary, the key of each element is extracted using the method and compared with the specified key. 此方法为 o （1） 运算，如果具有查找字典; 否则它是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(1) operation if the has a lookup dictionary; otherwise it is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 此代码示例演示的最少代码需要派生集合类从： 重写方法并提供的公共构造函数的委托给基类构造函数。This code example shows the minimum code necessary to derive a collection class from : overriding the method and providing a public constructor that delegates to a base class constructor. 下面的代码示例还演示了许多属性和方法继承和类。The code example also demonstrates many of the properties and methods inherited from and classes. `SimpleOrder`类是包含一个非常简单的请求列表`OrderItem`对象，其中每个表示顺序中的行项。The `SimpleOrder` class is a very simple requisition list that contains `OrderItem` objects, each of which represents a line item in the order. 键`OrderItem`不可变，派生自的类的重要考虑事项。The key of `OrderItem` is immutable, an important consideration for classes that derive from . 有关使用可变密钥的代码示例，请参阅。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . [!code-cpp[KeyedCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyedCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，包括添加的第一项时创建查找字典。By default, the includes a lookup dictionary that is created when the first item is added. 当将项添加到，一次提取并保存在更快的搜索查找字典项的键。When an item is added to the , the item's key is extracted once and saved in the lookup dictionary for faster searches. 可以通过重写此行为构造函数并指定字典创建阈值。This behavior can be overridden by using the constructor and specifying a dictionary creation threshold. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写受保护方法，以支持可变键，以及如何重写受保护， ， ，和方法以维护的键的完整性和集合中。The following code example shows how to override the protected method to support mutable keys, and how to override the protected , , , and methods to maintain the integrity of the keys and the collection. 此代码示例创建`MutableKeys`集合，派生自，和`MutableKey`类。The code example creates the `MutableKeys` collection, which derives from , and the `MutableKey` class. `MutableKey`类具有一个可设置`Key`属性。The `MutableKey` class has a settable `Key` property. 如果新的密钥分配给该属性，属性 setter 调用`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中)`ChangeKey`的集合以测试是否新密钥会与现有密钥冲突的方法。When a new key is assigned to the property, the property setter calls the `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `ChangeKey` method of the collection to test whether the new key would conflict with an existing key. 如果是这样，将引发异常，且未更改的属性值。If so, an exception is thrown and the property value is not changed. 为了维护之间的连接`MutableKey`对象和`MutableKeys`集合并防止对象插入到两个集合：`MutableKey`类具有`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中) `Collection`字段。In order to maintain the connection between a `MutableKey` object and the `MutableKeys` collection and to prevent an object from being inserted into two collections, the `MutableKey` class has an `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `Collection` field. 此字段由受保护的方法，它提供用于添加和从集合中，如移除项的自定义行为维护方法。This field is maintained by the protected methods that provide custom behavior for adding and removing items from the collection, such as the method. 该字段时添加到集合的项并且将其清除时移除的项设置。The field is set when the item is added to a collection and cleared when the item is removed. [!code-csharp[KeyedCollectionMutable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollectionMutable/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollectionMutable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollectionMutable/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果查找字典中的键是从中嵌入的密钥不同`item`，不能访问`item`使用返回的键。If the key in the lookup dictionary is different from the key that is embedded in `item`, you cannot access `item` by using the key returned by . 你可以实现此方法以返回`null`包含没有键的项的集合，这种情况下访问的项可以仅通过它们的索引。You can implement this method to return `null` for a collection that contains items without keys, in which case the items can be accessed only by their index. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## 实施者注意事项Notes for Implementers 你必须重写该方法以提供了一种方法从字典中的项中提取键的字典。You must override this method to provide the dictionary with a way to extract keys from items in the dictionary. 此方法在内部调用。This method is called internally. 不需要为其是公共的。It is not necessary for it to be public. ## Examples 此代码示例演示的最少代码需要派生集合类从： 重写方法并提供的公共构造函数的委托给基类构造函数。This code example shows the minimum code necessary to derive a collection class from : overriding the method and providing a public constructor that delegates to a base class constructor. 下面的代码示例还演示了许多属性和方法继承和类。The code example also demonstrates many of the properties and methods inherited from and classes. `SimpleOrder`类是包含一个非常简单的请求列表`OrderItem`对象，其中每个表示顺序中的行项。The `SimpleOrder` class is a very simple requisition list that contains `OrderItem` objects, each of which represents a line item in the order. 键`OrderItem`不可变，派生自的类的重要考虑事项。The key of `OrderItem` is immutable, an important consideration for classes that derive from . 有关使用可变密钥的代码示例，请参阅。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . [!code-cpp[KeyedCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyedCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection/VB/source.vb#1)]

实施者注意事项Notes for Implementers 重写此方法以提供自定义的行为和方法，继承自泛型类。Override this method to provide customized behavior for the and methods, inherited from the generic class. 调用此方法可以向基础集合插入项，并更新查找字典的基类实现。Call the base class implementation of this method to insert the item into the underlying collection and to update the lookup dictionary. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例演示如何重写方法以提供用于添加或将对象插入到集合的自定义行为。This section contains two code examples that demonstrate overriding the method to provide custom behavior for adding or inserting objects into the collection. 第一个示例中添加自定义通知事件并第二个具有可变键为的对象的集合提供支持。The first example adds a custom notification event and the second provides support for a collection of objects with mutable keys. 示例 1Example 1 下面的代码示例演示如何重写受保护， ， ，和方法，以提供自定义行为， ，和方法，以及设置默认属性 （C# 中的索引器）。The following code example shows how to override the protected , , , and methods, to provide custom behavior for the , , and methods, and for setting the default property (the indexer in C#). 在此示例中提供的自定义行为是名为的通知事件`Changed`，这在每个重写方法结束时引发。The custom behavior provided in this example is a notification event named `Changed`, which is raised at the end of each of the overridden methods. 此代码示例创建`SimpleOrder`类，该类派生自和表示简单订购窗体。The code example creates the `SimpleOrder` class, which derives from and represents a simple order form. 订购窗体包含`OrderItem`对象表示的项排序。The order form contains `OrderItem` objects representing items ordered. 此代码示例还创建`SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs`类，以包含事件信息和使用枚举标识的更改的类型。The code example also creates a `SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs` class to contain the event information, and an enumeration to identify the type of change. 该代码示例演示自定义行为通过调用的属性和方法的派生类中，在`Main`方法`Demo`类。The code example demonstrates the custom behavior by calling the properties and methods of the derived class, in the `Main` method of the `Demo` class. 此代码示例使用具有不可变的键的对象。This code example uses objects with immutable keys. 有关使用可变密钥的代码示例，请参阅。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . [!code-cpp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/vb/source.vb#1)] 示例 2Example 2 下面的代码示例演示如何重写受保护方法，以支持可变键，以及如何重写受保护， ， ，和方法以维护的键的完整性和集合中。The following code example shows how to override the protected method to support mutable keys, and how to override the protected , , , and methods to maintain the integrity of the keys and the collection. 此代码示例创建`MutableKeys`集合，派生自，和`MutableKey`类。The code example creates the `MutableKeys` collection, which derives from , and the `MutableKey` class. `MutableKey`类具有一个可设置`Key`属性。The `MutableKey` class has a settable `Key` property. 如果新的密钥分配给该属性，属性 setter 调用`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中)`ChangeKey`的集合以测试是否新密钥会与现有密钥冲突的方法。When a new key is assigned to the property, the property setter calls the `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `ChangeKey` method of the collection to test whether the new key would conflict with an existing key. 如果是这样，将引发异常，且未更改的属性值。If so, an exception is thrown and the property value is not changed. 为了维护之间的连接`MutableKey`对象和`MutableKeys`集合并防止对象插入到两个集合：`MutableKey`类具有`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中) `Collection`字段。In order to maintain the connection between a `MutableKey` object and the `MutableKeys` collection and to prevent an object from being inserted into two collections, the `MutableKey` class has an `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `Collection` field. 此字段由受保护的方法，它提供用于添加和从集合中，如移除项的自定义行为维护方法。This field is maintained by the protected methods that provide custom behavior for adding and removing items from the collection, such as the method. 该字段时添加到集合的项并且将其清除时移除的项设置。The field is set when the item is added to a collection and cleared when the item is removed. [!code-csharp[KeyedCollectionMutable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollectionMutable/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollectionMutable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollectionMutable/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性提供能够通过使用以下语法访问集合中的特定元素： `myCollection[key]` (`myCollection(key)`在 Visual Basic 中)。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[key]` (`myCollection(key)` in Visual Basic). > [!NOTE] > 此属性是不同于继承属性，用于获取和设置的数字索引的元素。This property is distinct from the inherited property, which gets and sets elements by numeric index. 但是，如果`TKey`属于类型，此属性将屏蔽继承的属性。However, if `TKey` is of type , this property masks the inherited property. 在这种情况下，你可以通过强制转换为访问继承的属性与其基类型。In that case, you can access the inherited property by casting the to its base type. 例如， `KeyedCollection` (`KeyedCollection(Of Integer, MyType)`在 Visual Basic 中， `KeyedCollection` c + + 中) 可以强制转换为`Collection`(`Collection(Of MyType)`在 Visual Basic 中， `Collection` c + + 中)。For example, `KeyedCollection` (`KeyedCollection(Of Integer, MyType)` in Visual Basic, `KeyedCollection` in C++) can be cast to `Collection` (`Collection(Of MyType)` in Visual Basic, `Collection` in C++). 如果具有查找字典，`key`用于从字典中检索的元素。If the has a lookup dictionary, `key` is used to retrieve the element from the dictionary. 如果没有任何查找字典，使用提取每个元素的键方法并与指定的键进行比较。If there is no lookup dictionary, the key of each element is extracted using the method and compared with the specified key. C# 语言使用关键字进行定义而不是实现索引器属性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 检索此属性的值是一项 o （1） 操作，如果具有查找字典; 否则它是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation if the has a lookup dictionary; otherwise it is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 此代码示例演示的最少代码需要派生集合类从： 重写方法并提供的公共构造函数的委托给基类构造函数。This code example shows the minimum code necessary to derive a collection class from : overriding the method and providing a public constructor that delegates to a base class constructor. 下面的代码示例还演示了许多属性和方法继承和类。The code example also demonstrates many of the properties and methods inherited from and classes. 代码示例同时调用属性，它是只读的并检索密钥，与属性，这是可设置并且按索引进行检索。The code example calls both the property, which is read-only and retrieves by key, and the property, which is settable and retrieves by index. 它演示如何访问后一个属性，如果派生的集合中的对象具有整数键，用于索引检索整数与无法加以区分。It shows how to access the latter property when the objects in the derived collection have integer keys, indistinguishable from the integers used for indexed retrieval. `SimpleOrder`类是包含一个非常简单的请求列表`OrderItem`对象，其中每个表示顺序中的行项。The `SimpleOrder` class is a very simple requisition list that contains `OrderItem` objects, each of which represents a line item in the order. 键`OrderItem`不可变，派生自的类的重要考虑事项。The key of `OrderItem` is immutable, an important consideration for classes that derive from . 有关使用可变密钥的代码示例，请参阅。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . returns.span: 如果该元素已成功移除，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 也将从查找字典移除元素的键。The key of the element is also removed from the lookup dictionary. 如果元素的数目超出了字典创建阈值和是使用查找字典，它将继续使用查找字典，即使元素的数目再次低于阈值。If the number of elements has exceeded the dictionary creation threshold and the is using a lookup dictionary, it will continue to use a lookup dictionary even though the number of elements is again under the threshold. > [!NOTE] > 若要自定义此方法的行为，请重写方法。To customize the behavior of this method, override the method. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 此代码示例演示的最少代码需要派生集合类从： 重写方法并提供的公共构造函数的委托给基类构造函数。This code example shows the minimum code necessary to derive a collection class from : overriding the method and providing a public constructor that delegates to a base class constructor. 下面的代码示例还演示了许多属性和方法继承和类。The code example also demonstrates many of the properties and methods inherited from and classes. 示例演示了方法继承自，其中中移除具有指定键的项以及和方法继承自，其中分别删除由对象和索引。The example demonstrates method inherited from , which removes the item with a specified key, and also the and methods inherited from , which remove by object and by index respectively. `SimpleOrder`类是包含一个非常简单的请求列表`OrderItem`对象，其中每个表示顺序中的行项。The `SimpleOrder` class is a very simple requisition list that contains `OrderItem` objects, each of which represents a line item in the order. 键`OrderItem`不可变，派生自的类的重要考虑事项。The key of `OrderItem` is immutable, an important consideration for classes that derive from . 有关使用可变密钥的代码示例，请参阅。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . span.span: The index of the element to remove.

summary.span: 移除 的指定索引处的元素。

span.span: Removes the element at the specified index of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 也将从查找字典移除元素的键。The key of the element is also removed from the lookup dictionary. 如果元素的数目超出了字典创建阈值和是使用查找字典，它将继续使用查找字典，即使元素的数目再次低于阈值。If the number of elements has exceeded the dictionary creation threshold and the is using a lookup dictionary, it will continue to use a lookup dictionary even though the number of elements is again under the threshold. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## 实施者注意事项Notes for Implementers 重写此方法以提供自定义的行为和方法，继承自泛型类，与方法。Override this method to provide customized behavior for the and methods, inherited from the generic class, and the method. 调用此方法可以从基础集合删除项，并更新查找字典的基类实现。Call the base class implementation of this method to remove the item from the underlying collection and to update the lookup dictionary. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例演示如何重写方法以提供自定义行为以从集合中删除对象。This section contains two code examples that demonstrate overriding the method to provide custom behavior for removing objects from the collection. 第一个示例中添加自定义通知事件并第二个具有可变键为的对象的集合提供支持。The first example adds a custom notification event and the second provides support for a collection of objects with mutable keys. 示例 1Example 1 下面的代码示例演示如何重写受保护， ， ，和方法，以提供自定义行为， ，和方法，以及设置默认属性 （C# 中的索引器）。The following code example shows how to override the protected , , , and methods, to provide custom behavior for the , , and methods, and for setting the default property (the indexer in C#). 在此示例中提供的自定义行为是名为的通知事件`Changed`，这在每个重写方法结束时引发。The custom behavior provided in this example is a notification event named `Changed`, which is raised at the end of each of the overridden methods. 此代码示例创建`SimpleOrder`类，该类派生自和表示简单订购窗体。The code example creates the `SimpleOrder` class, which derives from and represents a simple order form. 订购窗体包含`OrderItem`对象表示的项排序。The order form contains `OrderItem` objects representing items ordered. 此代码示例还创建`SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs`类，以包含事件信息和使用枚举标识的更改的类型。The code example also creates a `SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs` class to contain the event information, and an enumeration to identify the type of change. 该代码示例演示自定义行为通过调用的属性和方法的派生类中，在`Main`方法`Demo`类。The code example demonstrates the custom behavior by calling the properties and methods of the derived class, in the `Main` method of the `Demo` class. 此代码示例使用具有不可变的键的对象。This code example uses objects with immutable keys. 有关使用可变密钥的代码示例，请参阅。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . [!code-cpp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/vb/source.vb#1)] 示例 2Example 2 下面的代码示例演示如何重写受保护方法，以支持可变键，以及如何重写受保护， ， ，和方法以维护的键的完整性和集合中。The following code example shows how to override the protected method to support mutable keys, and how to override the protected , , , and methods to maintain the integrity of the keys and the collection. 此代码示例创建`MutableKeys`集合，派生自，和`MutableKey`类。The code example creates the `MutableKeys` collection, which derives from , and the `MutableKey` class. `MutableKey`类具有一个可设置`Key`属性。The `MutableKey` class has a settable `Key` property. 如果新的密钥分配给该属性，属性 setter 调用`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中)`ChangeKey`的集合以测试是否新密钥会与现有密钥冲突的方法。When a new key is assigned to the property, the property setter calls the `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `ChangeKey` method of the collection to test whether the new key would conflict with an existing key. 如果是这样，将引发异常，且未更改的属性值。If so, an exception is thrown and the property value is not changed. 为了维护之间的连接`MutableKey`对象和`MutableKeys`集合并防止对象插入到两个集合：`MutableKey`类具有`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中) `Collection`字段。In order to maintain the connection between a `MutableKey` object and the `MutableKeys` collection and to prevent an object from being inserted into two collections, the `MutableKey` class has an `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `Collection` field. 此字段由受保护的方法，它提供用于添加和从集合中，如移除项的自定义行为维护方法。This field is maintained by the protected methods that provide custom behavior for adding and removing items from the collection, such as the method. 该字段时添加到集合的项并且将其清除时移除的项设置。The field is set when the item is added to a collection and cleared when the item is removed. [!code-csharp[KeyedCollectionMutable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollectionMutable/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollectionMutable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollectionMutable/VB/source.vb#1)]

.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void SetItem(int32 index, !TItem item) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub SetItem (index As Integer, item As TItem)
protected: override void SetItem(int index, TItem item);

param.name: index
param.span: 要替换的项的从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the item to be replaced.
The new item.

summary.span: 使用指定项替换指定索引处的项。

span.span: Replaces the item at the specified index with the specified item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将相应地更新查找字典。The lookup dictionary is updated accordingly. 即，从查找字典中，删除将被替换的项的键，并添加新项的键。That is, the key of the item that is being replaced is removed from the lookup dictionary, and the key of the new item is added. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## 实施者注意事项Notes for Implementers 重写此方法以提供自定义的行为设置属性从继承泛型类。Override this method to provide customized behavior for setting the property inherited from the generic class. > [!NOTE] > 此方法不会影响的行为属性，它是只读的。This method does not affect the behavior of the property, which is read-only. 调用此方法以设置基础集合中的项并更新查找字典的基类实现。Call the base class implementation of this method to set the item in the underlying collection and to update the lookup dictionary. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例演示如何重写方法以提供设置的自定义行为属性。This section contains two code examples that demonstrate overriding the method to provide custom behavior for setting the property. 第一个示例中添加自定义通知事件并第二个具有可变键为的对象的集合提供支持。The first example adds a custom notification event and the second provides support for a collection of objects with mutable keys. 示例 1Example 1 下面的代码示例演示如何重写受保护， ， ，和方法，以提供自定义行为， ，和方法，以及设置默认属性 （C# 中的索引器）。The following code example shows how to override the protected , , , and methods, to provide custom behavior for the , , and methods, and for setting the default property (the indexer in C#). 在此示例中提供的自定义行为是名为的通知事件`Changed`，这在每个重写方法结束时引发。The custom behavior provided in this example is a notification event named `Changed`, which is raised at the end of each of the overridden methods. 此代码示例创建`SimpleOrder`类，该类派生自和表示简单订购窗体。The code example creates the `SimpleOrder` class, which derives from and represents a simple order form. 订购窗体包含`OrderItem`对象表示的项排序。The order form contains `OrderItem` objects representing items ordered. 此代码示例还创建`SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs`类，以包含事件信息和使用枚举标识的更改的类型。The code example also creates a `SimpleOrderChangedEventArgs` class to contain the event information, and an enumeration to identify the type of change. 该代码示例演示自定义行为通过调用的属性和方法的派生类中，在`Main`方法`Demo`类。The code example demonstrates the custom behavior by calling the properties and methods of the derived class, in the `Main` method of the `Demo` class. 此代码示例使用具有不可变的键的对象。This code example uses objects with immutable keys. 有关使用可变密钥的代码示例，请参阅。For a code example that uses mutable keys, see . [!code-cpp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyedCollection2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/KeyedCollection2/vb/source.vb#1)] 示例 2Example 2 下面的代码示例演示如何重写受保护方法，以支持可变键，以及如何重写受保护， ， ，和方法以维护的键的完整性和集合中。The following code example shows how to override the protected method to support mutable keys, and how to override the protected , , , and methods to maintain the integrity of the keys and the collection. 此代码示例创建`MutableKeys`集合，派生自，和`MutableKey`类。The code example creates the `MutableKeys` collection, which derives from , and the `MutableKey` class. `MutableKey`类具有一个可设置`Key`属性。The `MutableKey` class has a settable `Key` property. 如果新的密钥分配给该属性，属性 setter 调用`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中)`ChangeKey`的集合以测试是否新密钥会与现有密钥冲突的方法。When a new key is assigned to the property, the property setter calls the `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `ChangeKey` method of the collection to test whether the new key would conflict with an existing key. 如果是这样，将引发异常，且未更改的属性值。If so, an exception is thrown and the property value is not changed. 为了维护之间的连接`MutableKey`对象和`MutableKeys`集合并防止对象插入到两个集合：`MutableKey`类具有`internal`(`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中) `Collection`字段。In order to maintain the connection between a `MutableKey` object and the `MutableKeys` collection and to prevent an object from being inserted into two collections, the `MutableKey` class has an `internal` (`Friend` in Visual Basic) `Collection` field. 此字段由受保护的方法，它提供用于添加和从集合中，如移除项的自定义行为维护方法。This field is maintained by the protected methods that provide custom behavior for adding and removing items from the collection, such as the method. 该字段时添加到集合的项并且将其清除时移除的项设置。The field is set when the item is added to a collection and cleared when the item is removed.
